channel.title: Surprise Bag on madd0's tech blog
channel.description: Recent content in Surprise Bag on madd0's tech blog

item.title: Surprise bag, August 25
item.description: This is the first in an irregular series of posts where I bring you nice surprises I’ve found while browsing the Internet. I found today’s surprises in my RSS aggregator just waiting to be shared with the rest of the world*. Both of today’s surprises come from totally different sources, but they do have one thing in common: innovation. Both concern technology that is not yet available, but that’s totally awesome.
